Sentencas: La-doped SrTiO3 (LaxSr1-xTiO3, LST), as the promising ceramic-based interconnect material, usually needs to be sintered in reductive atmosphere at a temperature >= 1450 degrees C, such sintering condition is not friendly to cell fabrication and application.
Titulo: Dense La0.3Sr0.7TiO3 interconnect sintered in air atmosphere at a reduced temperature with improved conductivity for solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: To reduce the sintering temperature of air-sintered LST, seven sintering additives, Bi2O3, Fe2O3, Li2O, MnO2, NiO, V2O5, and Co3O4, are added to the LST in this work.
Titulo: Dense La0.3Sr0.7TiO3 interconnect sintered in air atmosphere at a reduced temperature with improved conductivity for solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: The results show that only Co3O4 is conductive to remarkable sintering at the temperatures of 1250 degrees C.
Titulo: Dense La0.3Sr0.7TiO3 interconnect sintered in air atmosphere at a reduced temperature with improved conductivity for solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: The relative density of LST-3%Co3O4 reaches 92%, while that of the pure LST is only 48%.
Titulo: Dense La0.3Sr0.7TiO3 interconnect sintered in air atmosphere at a reduced temperature with improved conductivity for solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the conductivity of LST-3%Co3O4 achieves 8.2 S/ cm at 800 degrees C in humidified hydrogen, which exceed 5.5 times that of the pure LST.
Titulo: Dense La0.3Sr0.7TiO3 interconnect sintered in air atmosphere at a reduced temperature with improved conductivity for solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: Interestingly, LST-3%Co3O4 exhibits an average TEC of 11.5 x 10-6 K-1 between 400 and 900 degrees C, which is very close to that of other components of SOCs.
Titulo: Dense La0.3Sr0.7TiO3 interconnect sintered in air atmosphere at a reduced temperature with improved conductivity for solid oxide electrochemical cells
